actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 4, 1897, to expand the Secretary of Agriculture's authority for permitting the free use of timber and stone found upon the national forests.

summary.text: Expands the Secretary of Agriculture's authority for permitting the free use of timber and stone found upon the national forests.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 4, 1897, to expand the Secretary of Agriculture's authority for permitting the free use of timber and stone found upon the national forests.
